Title: I've Been Down That Road Before
Plot: Rayna begins to settle into the tour when she discovers that Deacon has joined Juliette's band on the road, and she can't help but think that maybe the time has come to make some hard decisions. But will a heart to heart with Deacon help ease the sting of the revelation? Meanwhile Juliette is tired of her bubble gum pop success and is interested in exposing who she really is, though her team is convinced that will damage her commercial success. GuestStars: JD Souther, Rya Kihlstedt, Nicholas Strong, Kimberly Williams-Paisley
